snippet: A broad sweep of the artist’s unsettling work will inaugurate Bridget Donahue, a new gallery on the Bowery.
lead_paragraph: A broad sweep of the artist’s unsettling work will inaugurate Bridget Donahue, a new gallery on the Bowery.

headline.print_headline: Art: Technology and the Split Self
headline.main: Lynn Hershman Leeson Explores Technology and the Split Self
